Medications
Pharmacy
Review Your Request

If your medication is dispensed at a UCLA Health Pharmacy, you may directly request a refill by clicking on the Request Refill button. Your medication is filled at UCLA pharmacies if it has a Prescription Number.

If you use a commercial pharmacy (e.g. CVS, Walgreens, etc) or mail order, please call the pharmacy directly for a medication refill.

When you run out of refills, request another prescription from your UCLA Health doctor. Please note that physician approval must first be obtained before the pharmacies can fill and so, it may take longer than usual for these medications to be ready for pickup.

Choose prescriptions to refill.
